nodes.text: Gengh-Noghri were a sentient offshoot species of the Noghri distinguishable by their crocodilian heads filled with flesh-tearing teeth.

They were over two meters in height. The only known Gengh-Noghri resided on the planet Tulpaa, as they were the descendents of Noghri slaves taken by ancient Rakata to the planet years before the fall of the Infinite Empire.
